attributes.action: Tougher laws for all anti-social behaviour.To make the streets safer and cleaner
attributes.additional_details: Take a look the the crime figures this year. Stabbings every week in major cities, rapes, burglaries, litter, graffiti etc etc. There is hardly a street in any city or town where there aren't signs of anti-social behaviour. Cleaner streets, with zero-tolerance laws are what is needed to make this country safer for all law-abiding citizens. Real punishments are what are required, and the law needs to put the rights of the tax paying, law abiding citizens first.
attributes.background: To stop all anti-social crime such a littering, graffiti and to make our streets cleaner and safer for all law-abiding citizens. People are fed up with dirty, littered streets & of graffiti. Also violent offenders roaming our neighbourhoods with no respect for authority, and no real punishment.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about anti-social behaviour, but we're not sure exactly what legal changes you'd like to see. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
